parameters.name: FaceCount
parameters.description: Number of faces describing the bends

parameters.name: FaceArray
parameters.description: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of bend features that describe the bends that belong to this folds feature VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.

title: IFoldsFeatureData.ISetBends
description: Sets the bend features for this fold feature.
signature:
void ISetBends( 
   System.Int32
FaceCount
,
   ref System.Object
FaceArray
)

parameters.name: FaceCount
parameters.description: Number of faces describing the bends

parameters.name: FaceArray
parameters.description: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of bend features that describe the bends that belong to this folds feature VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.

remarks:
See
